title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 1847/93 of 9 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3201/90 laying down detailed rules for the description and presentation of wines and grape musts
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 1847/93 of 9 July 1993 amending Regulation (EEC) No 3201/90 laying down detailed rules for the description and presentation of wines and grape musts
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The names of the following varieties are added to Annex IV, Chapter '4. Australia'
/* Tables: see OJ */

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 July 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 84, 27. 3. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 154, 25. 6. 1993, p. 39.
(3) OJ No L 232, 9. 8. 1989, p. 13.
(4) OJ No L 368, 31. 12. 1991, p. 5.
(5) OJ No L 309, 8. 11. 1990, p. 1.
(6) OJ No L 369, 18. 12. 1992, p. 25.
